name: Iridescent Demo
description:
In Iridescent you play as Kruk. A special kind of doctor from the Astel family. You have been sent to a city where rumours of a new plague have been reported. Although you cannot help the sick you decide to leave the city and get help. Only to find out that the plague was only a small part of the world going insane.

This game is an action adventure game inspired by Zelda 2. It features hard combat, puzzles, collectables and bosses that will make demand of your skill.

The demo is a small part of the game. Around the first 2 "levels" for a lack of a better term. The future "levels" will be around the size of these two combined if not bigger. Around 7 new levels are planned not counting side quests. With the rate at which I am going I expect the game to be finished in 4-3.5 years. This is something I am making in any spare time I can scrap together.

Any feedback is HIGHLY appreciated for I have a hard time finding playtesters. This is the big reason why I am releasing this demo... to have people play it.

You can follow me on Twitter for frequent updates: @DraymaDev
You can also follow me on Youtube for not so frequent updates: https://www.youtube.com/@iridescentgamedevlogs5313
